name: packets
description:
“packets”  is a short, relaxing game where you play as a packet of data journeying through cyberspace in order to help deliver a message that you typed at the start of the game.

O O O

*** Download Windows build for better performance ***

Created for the Women Game Jam

August 21-30, 2020

O O O

Goals:

Traverse through the level and survive

Collect 5 key orbs and lead them to a tower to unlock access to next area in the level

Reach a checkpoint and repeat until the end

Controls:

WASD for movement

Mouse for Camera Control

O O O

O O O
